attributes.action: Ban the daily mail from ever making a news article again/reporting news.
attributes.additional_details:
Examples:
Two People, a white footballer and a black footballer both did the same thing but the black footballer was belittled - https://www.instagram.com/sterling7/p/BrKYvF3gH9e/?utm_source=ig_share_sheet&igshid=jnd9fttk5k5n

Daily Mail trying to make the shooters actions humanised and portraying him as a victim of trauma in the past to try justify what he did. - https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-6811785/Shooter-opens-fire-New-Zealand-injures-four-people-witnesses-say-heard-20-shots.html
attributes.background: Negative stereotypes, fake ideologies, a disgusting white supermacist media. It’s been going on for too long now. They belittle black people, they defend white terrorists by labelling them as mentally ill or trying to humanise the terrorists actions if his race is white.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to ban a newspaper because of its reporting.

The Independent Press Standards Organisation examines complaints about the press. If you wish to make a complaint about a newspaper's reporting you can do so here: 

https://www.ipso.co.uk/
